name: shift-spec
description: JavaScript representation of the Shift AST specification
author: Shape Security Labs

scripts.prepublish: rm -rf dist/* && npm update && npm run build && npm test && (if ! (git rev-list -1 v$npm_package_version 2>&1 > /dev/null) || [ "$(git rev-parse HEAD)" != "$(git rev-list -1 v$npm_package_version)" ]; then printf "\e[31mPackage version does not have corresponding git tag at HEAD.\e[0m\n"; exit 1; fi)
